Ever Feel Unwelcome

09 Aug 1999

Link: http://www.hell.com.

\nSite Description: Ever been at the door of a club, and not quite been cool/well dressed/rich enough to get in? Well that's what this site is. It's an entirely private site, which glories in its exclusivity.

\nThere is a guest area, however, which you can get to if you can find the 'join the guest list' page. You fill in your email address, and you get the URL by email.
